Product title: Towel and Linen Mart 100% Cotton - 24 Pack Wash Cloth Set - Flannel Face Cloths, Highly Absorbent and Soft Feel Fingertip Towels (Multi, Pack of 24)
Brand: Brand: T & L Towel and Linen Mart
Key Features: 100% Original Cotton: T & L towel and linen mart’s wash cloths are made with super fine premium cotton with extra-long fibers that make them durable and long-lasting. High-quality tightly woven cotton makes our wash cloths delightfully absorbent! These are also known to become softer, fluffier, and more absorbent with time. Edges are reinforced with fine double needle stitching so towels don’t warp or fray. | Elegant Design and Colors: Our premium quality washcloth come in a pack of 24 , each pack of 24 wash cloth packaged in one bag with 6 Multi color for your different daily needs These Multi colors give you more options to choose according to your room or home décor and get the luxurious feel. These make great gifts for all year round such as birthdays, opening of a Salon, Christmas, collage, summer and for any other occasion. | Ideal Size and Long Lasting Quality: T & L’s multi-functional Wash cloth come in an ideal size of 12 x 12''. These measurements are well-ordered in providing enough coverage while permitting towels not to take too long to dry. These wash cloths are practical for multiple uses such as salons, face wash, message, automotive, carpeting, polishing chrome, dusting dash boards and wax removal. This can also be used as a towel to wash your bathrooms, and around your house. | Quick-Drying and Easy to Wash: These washcloths are entirely machine washable and gets dried off very fast. Air dries quickly, preventing mold and mildew build-up. Avoid using any sort of bleach and fabric softener and do not iron. Enjoy the ease! You can throw them to wash separately and see them coming out fresh and clean. | Multi-purpose Wash Cloth Set for Bathroom: Our ultra-thick fiber is super airy and light-weighted that it absorbs everything in seconds and gets dried off very quickly. These high-quality super-classy wash cloth are there for your bath use, to dry hand and face or you can even use these to clean your makeup, to dry the dishes, use as a burp cloth, and use anywhere you need to wash and dry.
comment 1: Very good set of towels. Great deal for the price. - TeresaSCrawford
comment 2: What a great value for the money! They are not the best towels, but they are well worth what you pay. This is our second purchase of these towels. - crackshot
comment 3: Length is good size, the colors are great, they look great. My only complaint is how thin they are. But, they work great. They get you dry. Otherwise they would be 5 ⭐ - Kitty litter 🐈
comment 4: They're large and on the thinner side. I do not like thick heavy towels. They are absorbent and feel soft. Durable. Just what I ordered. - Mimzy
comment 5: I received and washed these washrags before using. My conflict with the quality is they came out very soft after wash. However they came out unraveling around the edges. I trimmed all the threads off and am going to use them just hope it doesnt happen every time they are washed - Kimbojoe
